undecided.micro-info: QR code for tickets and information

lva.Layer 1: Background is solid black, providing contrast for the white cubes.
lva.Layer 2: White cubes with black text and symbols, arranged in a dynamic, overlapping manner.
lva.Layer 3: Text on cubes includes dates, title, and additional information, using bold sans-serif typography.
lva.Layer 4: Vertical text on the right side provides details about the director, author, and venue.
lva.Layer 5: QR code on one of the cubes for easy access to tickets and more information.
